last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ricky Wilson, Nicole Scherzinger, Tinie Tempah, Katherine Ryan and Joel Dommett welcome David Walliams and Melanie C to the music and comedy show.

name: Bring the Noise
overview: Hosted by Ricky Wilson, this brand new music and comedy entertainment show puts celebrity teams to the test with music trivia, video parodies and unmissable performance battles. Nicole Scherzinger and Tinie Tempah take charge as team captains and comedians Katherine Ryan and Joel Dommet join the fun as regular panellists.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Ricky Wilson hosts a new and fun-filled music and comedy show. Captains Tinie Tempah and Nicole Scherzinger welcome David Tennant and Martin Kemp to their teams.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ricky Wilson and captains Nicole Scherzinger and Tinie Tempah welcome Game of Thrones' John Bradley and singer-songwriter Katy B to the music and comedy show.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Host Ricky Wilson and captains Joel Dommett and Tinie Tempah are joined by Melanie C, Laurence Fox and singer Foxes on the music and comedy show.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ricky Wilson, Nicole Scherzinger, Tinie Tempah, Katherine Ryan and Joel Dommett welcome actress Olivia Colman and rapper Wretch 32 to the music and comedy show.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The fun continues as Ricky Wilson and captains Nicole Scherzinger and Tinie Tempah welcome soul-pop singer John Newman and Hurts lead singer Theo Hutchcraft.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The fun continues as Ricky Wilson, Nicole Scherzinger and Tinie Tempah welcome comedian Frank Skinner and singer Anne-Marie to the music and comedy show.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Host Ricky Wilson and team captains Nicole Scherzinger and Tinie Tempah welcome The Wanted's Nathan Sykes and actor Craig Roberts to the music and comedy show.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ricky Wilson, Nicole Scherzinger, Tinie Tempah, Katherine Ryan and Joel Dommett welcome David Walliams and Melanie C to the music and comedy show.
